column17:
Prada Milano Infusion D'Iris Eau de Parfum - 100 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.3955

Over the decades she has evolved from the cherubic child into the youthful dreamer to the elegant lady queenly in her presence and regal by nature. As she deciphers the mystery of the chaotic world she matches the confusing contrasts of the universe with the ones in her own nature. For the woman who is an inexplicable enigma to everyone but herself the exalted fashion house of Prada Milano presents her with a fragrance that becomes second nature to her in the form of Infusion d’Iris. The luxury Eau de Toilette washes through her like a fresh sea breeze on an Italian voyage caressing her cheeks into an impetuous blush that adds to the glow that surrounds her.

Creator Daniela Roche-Andier captures the Prada woman’s fiery spirit in the piquant opening notes which are drunk with the accords of three different types of citrus - exotic African orange flower peppy orange and flavorful Mandarin orange. The camphoraceous tenor of lentisque lend the heart notes a deep tartness that is complemented by the soothing nature of iris and galbanum. Bezoin vetiver cedar show the smoky trail of the base with incense lending its lasting accords to the fragrance. Launched in 2007 Prada Milano Infusion d’Iris is captured in a simple flacon that speaks volumes about the fragrance within it and the woman it adorns. Continue your search for harmony in chaos and find your balance between the past and the contemporary with subtlety of  Infusion d’Iris.

column17:
Prada L' Eau Ambree Eau de Parfum - 80 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.4300

A beguiling woman with a deep and dark appeal she juggles an alluring sophistication with raw femininity. An endearing fabulist with a spritz of Prada L’Eau Ambree and this woman becomes utterly irresistible. Turning men into putty with nothing more than a wry smile she wears this sensual Eau De Parfum with panache. An inspiring accomplishment by acclaimed perfumer Daniela Roche-Andrier it is created for the esteemed house of Prada.

The top note opens with the a sprinkling of refreshing citruses over the delightful zest of Amalfi lemon bringing with it the essence of the sun-kissed Italian coast. Moving into the heart note tease your olfactory senses with a fragrant contrast of sweet feminine rose set against organic and slightly minty notes of patchouli. Finally the base note swirls together creamy hints of vanilla with smoky amber and honeyed resin of opoponax. This deep-scented luxury fragrance flaunts a unique and full-bodied aroma that is sure to leave you mesmerised. The rectangular brick-like bottle poses with a strong and daunting frame. Flaunting an intriguing gradient the hue ascends from ebony to a line of silver and topped with a simple gold stopper. As the sun sets and the nocturnal woman steps out of her mysterious lair this fragrance adds to her enigmatic presence.
